import java.math.BigInteger;
import java.util.Scanner;

class SATA1 {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
   BigInteger b;
   int t;
   BigInteger k;
   Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
   t=sc.nextInt();
   while(t>0)
   {b=sc.nextBigInteger();
   k=sc.nextBigInteger();
        if((b.mod(k)).equals(BigInteger.ZERO)) System.out.println("YES");
        else System.out.println("NO");
        t--;
   }
}
}
